data: Mayou | New Guinea | Solomon Group | Melanesia
Mayou | south-east New Guinea coast | Solomon Group

As the rising sun had just begun to pierce the misty tropic haze of early dawn, a small, white-painted schooner of ninety or a hundred tons burden was bearing down upon the low, densely-wooded island of Mayou, which lies between the coast of south-east New Guinea and the murderous Solomon Groupâ€”the grave of the white man in Melanesia.
